```{r}
#frequency <- "daily"

StockDataIteration <- function(ticker, date_from, date_to, frequency)
{
  getSymbols(ticker, from=date_from, to=date_to, periodicity=frequency, src="yahoo")
  chart <- chartSeries(ticker, theme=chartTheme("white"))
  return(chart)

}
```
